home.subtitle: Lille Gophers, the Haut-de-France source of Go talks!

description.0: Lille Gophers is born from the initiative of two Lillois, passionate about Golang environment.
description.1: With talks, use cases and projects, Lille Gophers want to promote this language and create a Lille's "Gophers" community.
description.2: It doesn't matter if you are a novice gopher or a hardened one, you will find your place inside our community.
description.3: Don't be afraid, join us during our next event!

events.title: next events
